title: How to Apply for a Cheque Book at ZX Bank
chunks:
How to Apply for a Cheque Book at ZX Bank > Steps to Apply for a Cheque Book at ZX Bank > Applying for a cheque book from ZX Bank is simple and can be done through multiple convenient channels. Follow the steps below to request your new cheque book.

---

## 1. **Via ZX Bank Mobile App**

1. **Login:** Open the **ZX Bank Asia** app and log in using your credentials or biometric authentication.
2. **Navigate:** Go to **Services** or **Request Services** on the home menu.
3. **Select:** Tap on **Cheque Book Request**.
4. **Choose Account:** Select the account for which you need the cheque book.
5. **Confirm Details:** Enter delivery address (if different from registered address).
6. **Submit:** Review and submit your request.  
   You’ll receive a confirmation SMS/email with the estimated delivery time.

---

## 2. **Through NetBanking**

1. **Log in** to [ZX Bank NetBanking](https://www.zxbank.asia).
2. Go to **Services > Cheque Book Request**.
3. Select your account and number of leaves required.
4. Verify your address and submit the request.
5. Track status online under **Request History**.

---

## 3. **At Branch**

1. Visit your nearest **ZX Bank branch**.
2. Fill out the **Cheque Book Request Form** at the counter.
3. Submit it to the bank officer along with valid ID, if required.
4. Collect acknowledgment receipt with expected dispatch date.

---

## 4. **Via ZX Bank ATM**

1. Insert your ZX Bank debit card and enter your PIN.
2. Go to **Services > Cheque Book Request**.
3. Select account and number of leaves.
4. Confirm the request to complete the process.

---

## 5. **ZX Bank Customer Care**

- Call ZX Bank’s 24x7 helpline: **1800-XXX-XXXX** (toll-free in India)
- Verify your details with the customer care executive.
- Place your cheque book request and note down the reference number.

---

How to Apply for a Cheque Book at ZX Bank > Frequently Asked Questions > ### ℹ️ **Frequently Asked Questions**

- **Delivery Time:** Cheque books are dispatched within 3–7 working days.
- **Charges:** The first cheque book of the year is usually free. Subsequent requests may incur standard charges.
- **Track Status:** Use the mobile app or NetBanking to check dispatch and delivery status.
- **Change Address:** Update your address before placing the request to ensure correct delivery.

---

For more assistance, visit [www.zxbank.asia](https://www.zxbank.asia) or contact your nearest ZX Bank branch.

title: Unified Payments Interface (UPI) – ZX Bank Asia
chunks:
Unified Payments Interface (UPI) – ZX Bank Asia > Introduction > What is UPI? > Unified Payments Interface (UPI) is a real-time payment system that enables instant money transfer between bank accounts using your mobile device. ZX Bank Asia supports UPI seamlessly through its mobile app for fast, secure, and convenient transactions.

- **Instant, 24x7 money transfers** via mobile devices  
- **Single app** for accessing multiple bank accounts  
- **Easy transactions** using mobile number, Virtual Payment Address (VPA), or QR codes  
- **Used for:** Fund transfer, bill payments, merchant payments, and more

Unified Payments Interface (UPI) – ZX Bank Asia > Activation and Setup > Steps to Activate UPI with ZX Bank > 1. **Download the ZX Bank Asia App**  
   - Available for: [Android](#) and [iOS](#)

2. **Login/Register**  
   - Use mobile number registered with ZX Bank  
   - Complete e-KYC if not already done

3. **Go to UPI Section**  
   - Tap 'UPI' icon or navigate via home screen

4. **Create or Link UPI ID (VPA)**
   - Example: `yourname@zxbank`
   - Choose/set your UPI PIN for secure transactions

5. **Link Your ZX Bank Account**
   - Select the account to operate UPI with

6. **Set/Reset UPI PIN**
   - Authenticate with debit card details
   - Set a 4/6-digit UPI PIN

7. **Ready to Use**
   - Start transacting, paying bills, transferring funds, and scanning UPI QR codes

Unified Payments Interface (UPI) – ZX Bank Asia > Transaction Limits > UPI Daily Limits with ZX Bank > | Transaction Type         | Limit                                                |
|------------------------- |-----------------------------------------------------|
| **Per Transaction**      | ₹1,00,000*                                          |
| **Per Day (total)**      | ₹1,00,000* across all UPI transactions              |
| **Max Transactions/Day** | 20 transfers**                                      |

> \*Limits as per NPCI & ZX Bank policies. Subject to change.   
> \*\*May vary based on customer risk profile and regulatory updates.

Unified Payments Interface (UPI) – ZX Bank Asia > Customer Support > UPI Customer Support Options > - **In-App:** Use 'Help & Support' section in ZX Bank Asia App > UPI  
- **Call:** ZX Bank Customer Care: 1800-XXX-XXXX (toll-free in India)  
- **Email:** upi.support@zxbank.asia  
- **Chat:** Ask "Zia" – ZX Bank's AI assistant – in the app for UPI help

Unified Payments Interface (UPI) – ZX Bank Asia > Additional Information > Service Availability and Notes > **Note:**  
- UPI services currently available in India for ZX Bank account holders  
- For cross-border payments/remittances, use dedicated remittance options in the app

---

_Last updated: June 2024_

file_name: Savings Account to a Salary Account.md
title: How to Convert Your ZX Bank Savings Account to a Salary Account
chunks:
How to Convert Your ZX Bank Savings Account to a Salary Account > Why Convert to a Salary Account? > - **Zero minimum balance** requirement (in most salary account types)
- **Faster salary credit** and alerts
- **Preferential offers** on loans, credit cards, and more
- **Fee waivers** on select services
- **Exclusive benefits** like insurance and accidental coverage

How to Convert Your ZX Bank Savings Account to a Salary Account > Steps to Convert Savings Account to Salary Account at ZX Bank > Steps to Convert Savings Account to Salary Account > ### 1. Check Your Employer's Tie-Up
- Confirm with your HR/Payroll department if they have a salary account arrangement with ZX Bank.
- Obtain the official employer letter or introduction.

### 2. Visit Your Home Branch or Use ZX Bank Asia App
- You can initiate the conversion:
  - By visiting your ZX Bank home branch, **OR**
  - Through the "Account Services" section in the **ZX Bank Asia** app

### 3. Provide Required Documents

Prepare the following documents:
- Copy of your **employee ID card**
- **Letter from employer** (on company letterhead) specifying:
   - Employment status and salary account introduction
   - Account number (if upgrade of an existing account)
- **PAN card** (if not already updated in records)
- **Recent passport-size photograph** (if required)
- **KYC update** if asked by bank staff

### 4. Fill Out Conversion Form

- At the branch: Ask for the **Account Conversion/Upgrade Form** and fill in the details.
- On app: Navigate to ☰ > Account Services > Convert to Salary Account and follow on-screen prompts. Upload scanned documents if prompted.

### 5. Verification and Processing

- The bank will verify documents.
- Upon successful verification, your account type will change to **Salary Account**.
- Obtain written/email confirmation from the bank.

### 6. Enjoy Salary Account Benefits!

- Zero minimum balance
- Priority services and offers
- Employer-specific benefits if applicable

How to Convert Your ZX Bank Savings Account to a Salary Account > Frequently Asked Questions > ### Q: Will my account number or debit card change?
**A:** No, your account number remains the same. Debit card change is only if you opt for exclusive salary account variants.

### Q: What if my salary is not credited for a few months?
**A:** If salary is not credited for 3-6 months (as per bank policy), the account may revert to a regular savings account with applicable minimum balance criteria.

### Q: Can I convert online?
**A:** Yes, if your employer is registered with ZX Bank and your KYC is up to date, you can use the ZX Bank Asia app or NetBanking for conversion.

---

_For more assistance, contact the nearest ZX Bank branch or call customer care via the ZX Bank Asia app._

🔗 [Visit ZX Bank Website](https://www.zxbank.asia)

file_name: Salary Account to a Savings Account.md
title: How to Convert Your Salary Account to a Savings Account at ZX Bank
chunks:
How to Convert Your Salary Account to a Savings Account at ZX Bank > Introduction and Overview > # How to Convert Your Salary Account to a Savings Account at ZX Bank

If your employment has changed, or your salary account is no longer receiving regular salary credits, you may need to convert your Salary Account to a regular Savings Account. At ZX Bank, this process is straightforward. Here’s how you can do it:

---

How to Convert Your Salary Account to a Savings Account at ZX Bank > Why Convert Your Salary Account? > ## Why Convert Your Salary Account?

- **Salary accounts** are typically provided to employees for salary credits and have special benefits.
- If salary credits stop (for 3+ months), your account may be automatically converted to a Savings Account by the bank, but manual conversion avoids service interruptions.
- Savings accounts have different features and requirements, including minimum balance criteria.

---

How to Convert Your Salary Account to a Savings Account at ZX Bank > Steps to Convert Salary Account to Savings Account > Steps to Convert Salary Account to Savings Account > ## Steps to Convert Salary Account to Savings Account

### 1. Visit Your Home Branch

- Locate your nearest **ZX Bank branch** (especially the one where you opened your salary account).
- Carry valid **proof of identity** (Aadhaar, PAN Card, Passport, etc.) and **account passbook/debit card**.

### 2. Fill Out the Account Conversion Request Form

- Request a **Salary to Savings Account Conversion Form** at the branch.
- Fill in your details, mention your account number, and select “Convert to Savings Account.”
- Attach self-attested copies of requested KYC documents (if required).

### 3. Submit the Form and Documents

- Hand over the filled form and documents to the branch staff.
- The staff will verify your documents and initiate the conversion process.

### 4. Maintain Minimum Balance

- Ensure you maintain the **required minimum balance** for Savings Accounts as per ZX Bank guidelines, to avoid charges.

### 5. Get Confirmation

- You will receive confirmation via SMS/email once the conversion is complete.
- Existing debit card, chequebook, and account number typically remain unchanged.

---

How to Convert Your Salary Account to a Savings Account at ZX Bank > Alternative: Conversion via Digital Banking > ## Alternative: Conversion via Digital Banking

ZX Bank also enables digital requests:

1. **Open the ZX Bank Asia Mobile App** or log into NetBanking.
2. Go to “Service Requests” > “Convert Salary Account to Savings Account.”
3. Fill in details and upload necessary KYC docs, if asked.
4. Receive confirmation after processing.

---

How to Convert Your Salary Account to a Savings Account at ZX Bank > Need Help? > ## Need Help?

- **Call Customer Care:** [ZX Bank Contact](https://www.zxbank.asia/contact)
- **Visit your Branch:** Find locations [here](https://www.zxbank.asia/branches)
- **Use Zia, the AI Chatbot:** Available in the ZX Bank Asia app for instant assistance

---

> **Note:** If the account is not converted and continues to have no salary credits, ZX Bank may automatically convert it to a savings account after a stipulated period as per bank policy.

---

**ZX Bank Ltd. | Your trusted banking partner in South Asia**

title: How to Report a Fraud Transaction at ZX Bank
chunks:
How to Report a Fraud Transaction at ZX Bank > Steps to Report a Fraud Transaction at ZX Bank > If you suspect or identify a fraudulent transaction on your ZX Bank account, follow these steps immediately to secure your funds and resolve the issue.

Step 1: Contact ZX Bank Immediately

- **Hotline (24x7):**  
  - India: 1800 123 9876  
  - Sri Lanka: +94 11 2345678  
  - Bangladesh: +880 9612 345678  
  - Bhutan: +975 2 345678  
  - Nepal: +977 1 2345678  

- **Email:** fraudreport@zxbank.asia  
- **Mobile App:** Go to **ZX Bank Asia** app → Support → Report Fraud  

Step 2: Block Your Card or Account (If Applicable)

- **Via Mobile App or NetBanking:**
  - Go to “Card Management” or “Account Services”
  - Select “Block/Card Hotlisting” or “Freeze Account”
  - Confirm the action

Step 3: Gather Key Information

When reporting, be ready with the following:
- Your account number/User ID
- Date and time of the suspicious transaction
- Transaction amount and details
- Any SMS/email alerts received
- Screenshots or documentation (if available)

Step 4: File a Written Complaint

- **In Branch:** Visit your nearest ZX Bank branch and submit a written complaint.
- **Online:**  
  - Use NetBanking > Service Requests > Dispute Transaction
  - Email a formal complaint to fraudreport@zxbank.asia

Step 5: Follow Up & Track Resolution

- ZX Bank will provide a reference number for your complaint.
- You can track progress via the app (Support > Track Requests) or by calling the hotline.
- ZX Bank targets resolution within 10 working days.

How to Report a Fraud Transaction at ZX Bank > Extra Tips > - **Never share PIN, OTP, or passwords with anyone.**
- **Activate transaction alerts via SMS and Email.**
- **Regularly review your account statements.**
- **For urgent blocking, use the “Block Instantly” option in the app.**

> **Your safety is our priority. Report suspicious activities as soon as possible to minimize risk.**

title: ZX Bank – Safety Features Against Online Threats

title: Health Insurance
chunks:
Health Insurance > Key Features > - **Coverage for Medical Expenses:** Includes hospitalization, surgeries, outpatient care, prescription drugs, diagnostics, and preventive services.
- **Cashless Treatment:** Many insurers offer cashless claim settlement at network hospitals, eliminating upfront payments by the policyholder.
- **Pre- and Post-Hospitalization:** Expenses incurred before and after hospitalization are often covered.
- **Family Floater Plans:** A single policy that covers the entire family under one sum insured.
- **Optional Add-ons:** Critical illness cover, maternity benefits, accidental benefits, and top-ups for enhanced protection.

Health Insurance > Types of Health Insurance > - **Individual Health Insurance:** Covers a single person.
- **Family Floater Health Insurance:** Covers the entire family under one policy.
- **Senior Citizen Health Insurance:** Customized for individuals above a certain age (typically 60+).
- **Critical Illness Insurance:** Lump sum payout on diagnosis of specific illnesses like cancer, heart attack, etc.
- **Group Health Insurance:** Provided by employers for their employees.

Health Insurance > Benefits > - **Financial Protection:** Shields against expensive medical treatments.
- **Access to Quality Healthcare:** Facilitates timely and quality healthcare services.
- **Tax Benefits:** Premiums paid are eligible for tax deductions (e.g., under Section 80D in India).
- **Peace of Mind:** Reduces the stress of unexpected medical emergencies.

Health Insurance > Important Terms > | Term                      | Description                                |
|---------------------------|--------------------------------------------|
| **Premium**               | Amount paid periodically for the policy    |
| **Sum Insured**           | Maximum amount insurance will cover        |
| **Pre-existing Diseases** | Illnesses already present before buying    |
| **Waiting Period**        | Tenure before certain benefits activate    |
| **Co-payment**            | Part of claim paid by the insured          |
| **Network Hospitals**     | Hospitals with direct cashless tie-ups     |

Health Insurance > How to Choose a Health Insurance Plan > 1. **Assess Your Needs:** Consider age, family size, health conditions.
2. **Compare Plans:** Look for coverage, exclusions, claim process, and premium.
3. **Check Network Hospitals:** Wide network ensures better access.
4. **Understand Exclusions:** Know what isn’t covered.
5. **Look for Add-ons:** Customize the policy for better protection.
6. **Review Claim Settlement Ratio:** Indicates reliability of insurer.

Health Insurance > Common Exclusions > - Pre-existing diseases (during waiting period)
- Cosmetic treatments
- Dental and vision (unless specified)
- Self-inflicted injuries
- Non-allopathic treatments

Health Insurance > Frequently Asked Questions > **Q: Is health insurance mandatory?**  
A: Not in most countries, but highly recommended due to rising healthcare costs.

**Q: What happens if a claim is denied?**  
A: Review the reason, appeal to the insurer, or approach a regulatory authority.

**Q: Can I port my health policy to another insurer?**  
A: Yes, most countries allow portability after certain conditions are met.

title: How to Open a Locker at ZX Bank Branch
chunks:
How to Open a Locker at ZX Bank Branch > Steps to Open a Locker at ZX Bank Branch > Step 1: Check Locker Availability

- Visit your nearest **ZX Bank branch** or call the branch directly.
- Inquire about locker sizes and availability.
- Popular sizes: Small, Medium, Large (availability may vary by location).

Step 2: Eligibility Criteria

- **Existing ZX Bank customer:** You must have (or open) a savings or current account.
- **KYC Compliance:** Ensure your KYC (Know Your Customer) details are updated.
    - Valid photo ID (Aadhaar/Passport/Driving License)
    - Address proof
    - Recent passport-sized photo

Step 3: Locker Application Process

1. **Visit the Branch:** Bring original documents and photocopies.
2. **Fill Application Form:** Request and complete the ‘Locker Facility Application Form’ at the branch.
3. **Submit KYC Documents:** Attach required KYC documents to your application.
4. **Locker Agreement:** Read and sign the Locker Hirer Agreement provided by the bank.

Step 4: Security Deposit & Rent Payment

- Pay the **refundable security deposit** (locker rent may vary by size and city).
- Locker rent is typically paid **annually**.
- Payment can be made via cash, cheque, or direct bank transfer.

Step 5: Locker Allotment & Access

- Upon approval, a locker number will be allotted.
- Receive the **locker keys** (usually two keys; bank does not keep duplicates).
- The bank officer will guide you on locker location and operating procedure.

Step 6: Operating the Locker

- Locker can be operated **during branch working hours**.
- Visit the branch with your locker keys and valid ID proof.
- Sign the **Locker Access Register** each time you access the locker.
- All locker operations are conducted in privacy in the vault area.

How to Open a Locker at ZX Bank Branch > Additional Guidelines > - **Nomination:** Highly recommended to nominate a beneficiary for your locker.
- **Joint Locker:** You can opt for a joint locker with another account holder.
- **Loss of Key:** Inform the bank immediately; charges apply for key duplication/drilling.
- **Annual Rent:** Pay annual rent on time to avoid late fees or locker freeze.

How to Open a Locker at ZX Bank Branch > For Assistance > - **Visit:** Nearest ZX Bank branch
- **Website:** [www.zxbank.asia](https://www.zxbank.asia)
- **Customer Care:** Check the contact section on the official website or mobile app

> **Secure your valuables with peace of mind at ZX Bank!**

title: ZX Bank Ltd. – Savings Account Overview
chunks:
ZX Bank Ltd. – Savings Account Overview > Savings Account Features > - **Attractive Interest Rates:** Earn competitive interest on your daily balance.
- **Zero or Low Minimum Balance Options:** Choose accounts that suit your needs and avoid penalties.
- **Instant Account Activation:** Through fully digital onboarding (e-KYC) and AI-powered support.
- **Free International Debit Card:** Accepted worldwide for shopping, travel, and online payments.
- **Seamless Digital Access:** Manage your account via ZX Bank Asia mobile app and NetBanking.
- **UPI & QR Payments:** Fast money transfers and secure payments on the go.
- **Reward Points:** Earn rewards on all debit transactions.
- **Safe & Secure:** Biometric login, card controls, and transaction alerts for peace of mind.
- **Nomination Facility:** Assign a nominee for account safety.

ZX Bank Ltd. – Savings Account Overview > How to Apply for a ZX Bank Savings Account > Steps to Open a ZX Bank Savings Account > You can open a ZX Bank Savings Account easily through these channels:

### 1. **Via Mobile App or Website**
   - Download the **ZX Bank Asia** app (Android/iOS) or visit [www.zxbank.asia](https://www.zxbank.asia)
   - Click “Open Savings Account”
   - Fill in your details and upload necessary documents (PAN/ID, Address Proof)
   - Complete e-KYC via video or Aadhaar OTP
   - Account activation is done within minutes!

### 2. **At Branch**
   - Visit your nearest ZX Bank branch  
   - Submit KYC documents with a duly filled application form
   - Staff will assist you with on-the-spot e-KYC
   - Collect your Welcome Kit instantly

ZX Bank Ltd. – Savings Account Overview > Minimum Balance Requirements > | Account Type          | Minimum Balance            |
|-----------------------|---------------------------|
| Regular Savings       | ₹5,000 (India) / LKR 3,000 (Sri Lanka) |
| Digital Zero Balance  | Nil (No minimum balance)  |
| Senior Citizens/Students | ₹1,000 (India)         |

> **Note:** Minimum balance varies by country and account variant. Please check with your local branch or the website for details.

ZX Bank Ltd. – Savings Account Overview > ZX Bank Savings Account Kit > Kit Includes > All new ZX Bank Savings Account holders receive an exclusive **Savings Account Kit**, enhancing your banking and travel experiences.

- **Welcome Travel Bag:** Stylish, durable bag perfect for daily commutes or travel

title: Safety Practices to Protect Yourself from Online Threats
chunks:
Safety Practices to Protect Yourself from Online Threats > Essential Safety Practices > Staying safe online is crucial to protect your personal data, finances, and digital identity. Here are essential safety practices ("parasites" can be corrected as "practices") to follow:

---

## 1. **Use Strong, Unique Passwords**
- Create complex passwords using a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols.
- Avoid using the same password for multiple sites.
- Use a trusted password manager to store your credentials.

## 2. **Enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)**
- Add an extra layer of security with 2FA on all important accounts (email, banking, social media).

## 3. **Beware of Phishing Scams**
- Don’t click on suspicious links or download attachments from unknown sources.
- Double-check email addresses and URLs for authenticity.
- Never share personal information over email or phone unless you initiated contact.

## 4. **Keep Software Up to Date**
- Regularly update your operating system, apps, browsers, and antivirus programs to patch vulnerabilities.

## 5. **Secure Your Devices**
- Use a screen lock (PIN, password, or fingerprint) on smartphones and computers.
- Install trusted antivirus and anti-malware software.

## 6. **Use Secure Connections**
- Avoid public Wi-Fi for sensitive transactions; use a VPN when needed.
- Only enter personal or financial information on websites with HTTPS.

## 7. **Monitor Bank and Credit Accounts**
- Review statements regularly for unauthorized transactions.
- Set up instant alerts for account activity.

## 8. **Manage Privacy Settings**
- Limit what information you share on social media and adjust privacy controls.
- Be wary of apps requesting unnecessary permissions.

## 9. **Backup Important Data**
- Regularly backup your files to a secure cloud service or external device.

## 10. **Educate Yourself & Stay Informed**
- Learn about new and emerging online threats.
- Participate in cybersecurity awareness programs.

---

> **Stay alert and proactive. Safe online habits protect your identity, money, and peace of mind!**

title: ASK Zia – Your 24/7 Banking Assistant
chunks: ASK Zia – Your 24/7 Banking Assistant > Introduction > Meet **ASK Zia**, ZX Bank’s intelligent AI-powered chatbot, designed to make your banking experience seamless, simple, and secure. Now available on both our website and WhatsApp!

ASK Zia – Your 24/7 Banking Assistant > Features > ASK Zia on Website > - **Instant Answers**: Get real-time responses to your banking queries.
- **Smart Assistance**: From locating branches and ATMs to product information (accounts, loans, credit cards, etc.).
- **Secure Service Requests**: Request statements, check balances, or block lost cards—directly from your browser.
- **Product Comparisons**: Let Zia guide you to the right savings account, loan, or card.
- **24/7 Availability**: Zia is always online, ready to help whenever you visit www.zxbank.asia.

ASK Zia – Your 24/7 Banking Assistant > Features > ASK Zia on WhatsApp > - **Easy Onboarding**: Start a chat by saving our official number and saying "Hello Zia!"
- **Quick Banking Tasks**: Balance checks, mini statements, fund transfers, bill payments—all from your WhatsApp chat.
- **Bill Reminders & Alerts**: Receive timely reminders and transaction notifications.
- **Personal Financial Insights**: Zia summarizes spending and gives savings tips.
- **Language Support**: Interact in English, Hindi, Sinhala, Bengali, and Nepali.

ASK Zia – Your 24/7 Banking Assistant > Security and Privacy > Safe & Private > ASK Zia uses **end-to-end encryption**, secure authentication, and never asks for sensitive data like your PIN or passwords.

*All actions performed via Zia comply with ZX Bank’s privacy and security policies.*

ASK Zia – Your 24/7 Banking Assistant > How to Use > On Website > 1. Look for the Zia chat icon on www.zxbank.asia.
2. Start typing your question – Zia responds instantly!

ASK Zia – Your 24/7 Banking Assistant > How to Use > On WhatsApp > 1. Save our official WhatsApp number: **+91-XXX-XXX-XXXX**
2. Send a message: `Hello Zia`
3. Follow prompts to access banking features.

ASK Zia – Your 24/7 Banking Assistant > Benefits > Why Ask Zia? > - No queues, no waiting.
- Simple answers for complex questions.
- Personalized, friendly, and multilingual support.
- Works anytime, anywhere in South Asia.
ASK Zia – Your 24/7 Banking Assistant > Contact > **Have a question? Just ASK Zia!**

title: How to Close Your ZX Bank Credit Card
chunks:
How to Close Your ZX Bank Credit Card > Steps to Close Your ZX Bank Credit Card > 1. **Clear Outstanding Dues**
   - **Pay Off All Dues:** Settle any outstanding amounts (balances, fees, charges, or EMI on the card).
   - **Download Statements:** Keep a record of your final statement for future reference.

2. **Redeem Unused Rewards**
   - **Check for Points:** Redeem all reward points, cashback, or benefits, as they will be lost after closure.

3. **Cancel Auto-debits & Linked Payments**
   - **Deactivate:** Cancel standing instructions, auto-debits, or subscriptions linked to your card.

4. **Request Card Closure**
   You can place a closure request using any of the following channels:

   **a. Via ZX Bank Mobile App ("ZX Bank Asia")**
     1. Login to the app.
     2. Go to **Card Services** > **Credit Card Closure**.
     3. Select your card and follow the on-screen prompts.

   **b. Through ZX NetBanking**
     1. Login to ZX NetBanking.
     2. Navigate to **Cards** > **Credit Cards** > **Close Credit Card**.
     3. Select your credit card and confirm your request.

   **c. Customer Care**
     - Call 24x7 helpline:  
       - India: 1800-123-4567  
       - Sri Lanka: 011-2345678  
       - Bangladesh: 0961-234567  
     - Request card closure with your card details handy.

   **d. Branch Visit**
     - Visit your nearest ZX Bank branch.
     - Submit a written request or fill out a card closure form.

5. **Destroy the Card**
   - **After confirmation,** cut your card (including chip and magnetic strip) and dispose of it securely.

6. **Obtain Closure Confirmation**
   - **Closure Letter/Email:** ZX Bank will send a closure confirmation within 7 working days.
   - **Check CIBIL/Credit Report:** Ensure the card appears as ‘closed’ (not ‘settled’).

How to Close Your ZX Bank Credit Card > Important Notes and Contact Information > - Closing a credit card may affect your credit score.
- You cannot re-activate a closed card; a new application is required.
- If you see continuing charges post-closure, inform ZX Bank immediately.

For help, contact ZX Bank Customer Care via the **ZX Bank Asia** mobile app or visit [www.zxbank.asia](http://www.zxbank.asia).

title: ZX Bank – NetBanking Guide
chunks: ZX Bank – NetBanking Guide > What is NetBanking? > ZX Bank NetBanking is a secure online banking platform for individuals and businesses to manage accounts, perform transactions, pay bills, and access banking services anytime, anywhere.

ZX Bank – NetBanking Guide > Features > - **Account balance & statement viewing**
- **Fund transfers (within ZX Bank & other banks)**
- **Bill payments & mobile/DTH recharge**
- **Open/close Fixed Deposits & Recurring Deposits**
- **Loan & Credit Card management**
- **Utility features**: Stop cheque, request cheque book, manage beneficiaries

ZX Bank – NetBanking Guide > How to Activate ZX Bank NetBanking > Steps to Activate ZX Bank NetBanking > 1. **Self-Registration (Online)**
    1. Visit [ZX Bank Asia Website](https://www.zxbank.asia)
    2. Click on **‘NetBanking Login’** and select **‘New User/Register’**
    3. Enter:
        - Customer ID (from passbook/account statement)
        - Registered mobile number
        - Verification via OTP
    4. Set your NetBanking username and password.
    5. Login and set transactional password & security questions.

2. **Activation via Branch**
    - Visit any ZX Bank branch.
    - Fill NetBanking registration form.
    - Receive welcome kit/activation link on mobile/email.
    - Set your login and transaction password.

3. **Activation via Mobile App**
    - Download the **ZX Bank Asia** app (Android/iOS).
    - Select ‘Register for NetBanking’.
    - Follow in-app instructions (similar to online self-registration).

ZX Bank – NetBanking Guide > Daily Transaction Limits (Indicative) > | **Service**               | **Per day Limit**        |
|---------------------------|-------------------------|
| NEFT/RTGS (Fund transfer) | ₹10,00,000              |
| IMPS/UPI                  | ₹2,00,000               |
| Bill Payments             | ₹1,00,000               |
| Own ZX Bank account Txns  | ₹20,00,000              |

> **Note:** Corporate/priority customers may request for higher limits. Limits can be customized via branch or customer support, subject to approval and enhanced security.

ZX Bank – NetBanking Guide > Security Tips > - Never share your NetBanking password/OTP.
- Update password regularly.
- Login only via official website or ZX Bank Asia app.
- Enable two-factor authentication.

ZX Bank – NetBanking Guide > Support > - **Helpdesk:** 
    - Toll-Free India: 1800-123-4567
    - Sri Lanka: +94-11-2345678
    - Bangladesh: +880-17-12345678
    - Bhutan: +975-2-123456
    - Nepal: +977-1-1234567  
- **Email:** netbanking.support@zxbank.asia
- **Chat:** 24×7 Zia AI Assistant via app/website  
- **Branch Support:** Visit any branch for in-person assistance.

> For more information visit: [www.zxbank.asia/netbanking](https://www.zxbank.asia/netbanking)

title: ZX Bank Ltd. – Salary Saving Account
chunks:
ZX Bank Ltd. – Salary Saving Account > Salary Saving Account Features > - **Zero Balance Facility**: No need to maintain a minimum balance — enjoy complete convenience.
- **Instant Account Opening**: Open your account instantly via digital onboarding or at any branch.
- **Free Debit Card**: Complimentary international debit card for secure and easy transactions.
- **Auto Sweep Fixed Deposit**: Automatic transfer of surplus funds into Fixed Deposits for higher returns.
- **Unlimited Fund Transfers**: Free and unlimited fund transfers via IMPS, NEFT, RTGS, and UPI.
- **Preferential Loan Rates**: Special interest rates on personal loans, home loans, and car loans.
- **Bill Payments & Recharge**: Pay utility bills and recharge mobile/DTH instantly via the ZX Bank app.
- **AI-powered Banking Assistant**: 24x7 help from Zia, your smart banking assistant.

ZX Bank Ltd. – Salary Saving Account > How to Apply for a Salary Saving Account > Online Steps > 1. **Visit [www.zxbank.asia](https://www.zxbank.asia) or Download the ZX Bank Asia Mobile App.**
2. **Click on “Open Salary Saving Account”.**
3. **Complete e-KYC verification:** Upload Aadhaar, PAN, and latest salary slip.
4. **Fill out the application form:** Provide basic and employment details.
5. **Review and submit:** Verify details and submit application. Receive account number instantly.

ZX Bank Ltd. – Salary Saving Account > How to Apply for a Salary Saving Account > Branch Process > 1. **Visit your nearest ZX Bank branch.**
2. **Ask for the Salary Saving Account Opening Form.**
3. **Submit documents:** ID proof, address proof, PAN card, and salary slip.
4. **Complete biometric/KYC process with bank representative.**
5. **Receive account kit and activation confirmation.**

ZX Bank Ltd. – Salary Saving Account > Minimum Balance Requirement > - **Zero Minimum Balance!**
    - Salary Saving Account holders enjoy a true zero-balance facility, with no penalties for non-maintenance.

ZX Bank Ltd. – Salary Saving Account > Savings Account Welcome Kit > All new Salary Saving Account holders receive an exclusive **Savings Account Kit**, which includes:

- **ZX Bank Branded Travel Bag**
    - Sturdy, stylish, and perfect for business or leisure trips.

- **International Travel Adapter (4 Plugs, 150 Countries)**
    - Seamlessly connect your devices worldwide 
    - Includes EU, UK, US, and AUS plugs
    - USB charging ports for convenience

- **Welcome Letter & Account Documents**
    - Account number, debit card, and net banking credentials

- **Debit Card**
    - International validity and contactless features

ZX Bank Ltd. – Salary Saving Account > Need Help? > - Use the **ZX Bank Asia Mobile App’s AI Assistant "Zia"** for guided onboarding or queries.
- Call customer helpline (number available on [zxbank.asia](https://www.zxbank.asia))
- Visit any branch for personalized assistance.

title: ZX Bank Agriculture Loan

ZX Bank Agriculture Loan > Key Features > - **Flexible Loan Amounts:** From ₹25,000 up to ₹50 lakhs (or local equivalent)
- **Attractive Interest Rates:** Competitive and affordable for farmers
- **Flexible Repayment:** Seasonal EMI or bullet repayment options
- **Quick Disbursement:** Fast-tracked application & approval process

- **Collateral Options:** Available as secured or partially secured loans

ZX Bank Agriculture Loan > Eligibility Criteria > Who Can Apply? > - Individual farmers
- Joint landholders
- Self Help Groups (SHGs)
- Agribusinesses and cooperatives

ZX Bank Agriculture Loan > Application Requirements > Documents Required > - Identity Proof (Aadhaar, Voter ID, Passport, etc.)
- Address Proof
- Land Ownership/Lease documents
- Recent passport-sized photographs
- Kisan Credit Card (optional)
- Quotations/invoices for equipment (if applicable)

ZX Bank Agriculture Loan > Application Process > Steps to Apply for ZX Bank Agriculture Loan > ### **1. Online Application (Recommended)**
- Download the **ZX Bank Asia** Mobile App (Android / iOS)
- Login/Register with mobile number and e-KYC
- Go to **Loans > Agriculture Loan**
- Fill out the application form & upload documents
- Track your application status in real-time

### **2. Visit a Branch or Digital Kiosk**
- Visit your nearest ZX Bank branch or digital banking kiosk

title: ZX Bank – Account Closure Guide
chunks:
ZX Bank – Account Closure Guide > How to Close a Savings Account > Steps to Close a Savings Account > **Steps:**
1. **Visit Your Home Branch**  
   Bring valid photo ID (e.g., Aadhaar, Passport) and your passbook/debit card.

2. **Fill Out the Account Closure Form**  
   Request and complete the ‘Savings Account Closure Form’ at the branch.

3. **Settle Dues**  
   Ensure all cheque books and debit cards are returned. Settle any outstanding charges.

4. **Withdraw Remaining Balance**  
   The final balance will be paid in cash or transferred to another account of your choice.

5. **Get Confirmation**  
   Obtain an account closure acknowledgment receipt.

**Can I apply online?**  
Currently, ZX Bank requires in-branch verification for savings account closures.

ZX Bank – Account Closure Guide > How to Close a Current Account > Steps to Close a Current Account > **Steps:**
1. **Visit the Opening Branch**  
   Bring company/entity proofs (for business accounts) and authorized signatory’s ID.

2. **Submit Account Closure Form**  
   Fill and sign the ‘Current Account Closure Form’. For joint or partnership accounts, all account holders/signatories must sign.

3. **Return Documents and Cheques**  
   Return all unused cheque leaves, debit/ATM cards & passbook.

4. **Settle Pending Dues**  
   Clear any outstanding overdrafts, fees, or charges.

5. **Receive Closure Confirmation**  
   Ask for a written confirmation/receipt from the bank.

**Note:** Funds will be transferred as per your instructions, or withdrawn in cash.

ZX Bank – Account Closure Guide > How to Close a Salary Account > Steps to Close a Salary Account > **Steps:**
1. **Inform Your Employer**  
   Notify your HR/payroll department, especially if it’s a corporate-linked salary account.

2. **Visit Any ZX Bank Branch**  
   Carry your photo ID and debit card.

3. **Submit Account Closure Form**  
   Fill out the ‘Salary Account Closure Form’. Return cheque book and debit card.

4. **Withdraw the Remaining Balance**  
   You may choose to transfer or withdraw the amount.

5. **Obtain Acknowledgment**  
   Take a receipt for closure from the bank.

**Must-Know:**  
If your salary is not credited for 3 consecutive months, the salary account may convert to a savings account, with related charges applicable.

ZX Bank – Account Closure Guide > Need Help? > - **Contact ZX Bank Customer Care:**
    - Call: [ZX Bank Helpline]  
    - Email: support@zxbank.asia  
    - Chat: Use the ‘Zia’ AI assistant in the ZX Bank Asia App.

- **Locate Branch:**  
  [Branch Locator](https://www.zxbank.asia/locator)

*Please ensure all auto-debits/standing instructions are cancelled before closing your account. Charges may apply as per bank policy. For more details, visit [www.zxbank.asia](https://www.zxbank.asia/terms-closure).*

title: ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide
chunks: ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > Overview > The **ZX Bank Asia** mobile app is your gateway to seamless, secure, and smart banking. With support for Android and iOS, manage your finances on the go with intuitive banking features, advanced security, and real-time assistance.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > How to Download the ZX Bank Asia App > **For Android:**
1. Open Google Play Store.
2. Search for: `ZX Bank Asia`.
3. Tap `Download` and install the app.

**For iOS:**
1. Open Apple App Store.
2. Search for: `ZX Bank Asia`.
3. Tap `Get` and install the app.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > How to Activate Mobile Banking > 1. **Open the ZX Bank Asia App**.
2. Tap on `Register / Activate`.
3. Enter your registered mobile number & customer ID/account number.
4. Authenticate via OTP sent to your mobile.
5. Set your preferred login PIN or configure biometric authentication (fingerprint/Face ID).
6. Complete e-KYC verification if prompted.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > How to Login > - Open the app.
- Enter your PIN or use biometric login (if enabled).
- Access your dashboard securely.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > App Features > Account Management > - Check savings/current account balances.
- View transaction history and mini statements.
- Track FD, RD, and loan details in real-time.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > App Features > Fund Transfer > #### **Within ZX Bank / Other Banks**
1. Tap `Fund Transfer`.
2. Choose between ZX Bank or Other Bank (NEFT/IMPS/UPI).
3. Select/Add payee (see below).
4. Enter amount & remarks.
5. Confirm with PIN/OTP.

#### **Add Payee**
1. Go to `Fund Transfer` → `Manage Payees`.
2. Select `Add Payee`.
3. Enter payee's account info (name, bank details, IFSC) or UPI ID.
4. Verify via OTP.
5. Payee is added–start transferring.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > App Features > Bill Payments & QR > - Pay electricity, water, gas, mobile & credit card bills.
- Scan & pay using QR codes at merchants or for quick money transfers.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > App Features > Cards > #### **Check, Apply & Manage Credit/Debit Cards**
- View existing cards with usage summary, payment due dates, statements, and reward points.
- **Block Card**: Select card → More options → Block (immediate effect).
- **Reset Card PIN**: Select card → Change PIN → Enter old & new PIN.
- **Apply New Card**: Cards Menu → Apply for New Card → Choose credit or debit → Fill application & submit docs.

#### **Set Card Limits**
- Go to `Manage Cards`.
- Choose the card and tap `Set Transaction Limit`.
- Adjust for ATM, POS, online, contactless—save changes.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > App Features > Loans > - View all loans, EMIs, schedules & download statements.
- Apply for new loans: Home, personal, or vehicle → Fill form → Upload KYC → Track status.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > App Features > Rewards > - Check `Rewards` tab for current points.
- Redeem reward points instantly for vouchers, cashback, or gift cards.
ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > App Features > NRI & Wealth > - Access NRI services, mutual funds, wealth advisory, and initiate investments.
ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > App Features > Chatbot – Zia > - Ask Zia for help with account queries, product info, quick balance, and transaction support.

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > Security Options > - Biometric login (fingerprint/Face ID)
- Dynamic device registration & One-Time Password (OTP) validation
- Instant blocking of internet/mobile banking through the app

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > Other Popular Services > - **Request Cheque Book**: Accounts → Services → Request Cheque Book
- **Update Contact Details**: Profile → Edit → Authenticate with OTP
- **Mini Statements**: Account → View Mini Statement
- **Locate Branch/ATM**: Find ZX Bank locations in all supported countries
- **Notifications**: Get real-time alerts for all transactions and offers

ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > Customer Support > - Use in-app chat or helpline.
- Email or schedule branch appointments via the app.
ZX Bank Asia Mobile App Guide > Download & Start Banking Smarter > > **Download & start banking smarter with the [ZX Bank Asia App](https://www.zxbank.asia)!**

title: ZX Bank Fixed Deposits
chunks:
ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > Introduction > ZX Bank offers attractive and secure Fixed Deposit (FD) solutions tailored for individuals, businesses, and Non-Resident Indians (NRIs) across its operating countries. With ZX Bank's robust digital services and reliable branch presence, customers can enjoy seamless booking, management, and maturity payouts of fixed deposits.

---

ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > Why Choose ZX Bank Fixed Deposits? > - **Competitive Interest Rates:** Enjoy higher returns compared to regular savings accounts.
- **Flexible Tenures:** Tenure options ranging from 7 days to 10 years.
- **Safe & Secure:** Backed by ZX Bank’s sound financial position and regulatory compliance.
- **Loan Against FD:** Avail instant overdraft or loans up to 90% of your FD value.
- **Premature Withdrawal:** Facility available (premature closure charges may apply).
- **Digital Opening:** Open, renew, or close FDs instantly through ZX Bank Asia mobile app or NetBanking.

---

ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > Features & Benefits > - Minimum Deposit: ₹5,000 (India), LKR 10,000 (Sri Lanka), BDT 10,000 (Bangladesh), BTN 1,000 (Bhutan), NPR 1,500 (Nepal)
- Interest Payout: Choose from monthly, quarterly, or on maturity payout options
- Special Schemes: Senior citizen extra interest, tax-saver FDs, recurring deposit variants
- Joint Deposits: Facility for joint holding and nomination
- Auto-renewal: Hassle-free renewal option available

---

ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > Available In > | Country     | Currency      | Branch Booking | Online/Digital Booking |
|-------------|--------------|:--------------:|:---------------------:|
| India       | INR          | ✅             | ✅                    |
| Sri Lanka   | LKR          | ✅             | ✅                    |
| Bangladesh  | BDT          | ✅             | ✅                    |
| Bhutan      | BTN          | ✅             | ✅                    |
| Nepal       | NPR          | ✅             | ✅                    |

---

ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > How to Apply > Steps to Apply for ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > 1. **Via Mobile App:**  
   - Download the ZX Bank Asia app (Android/iOS)
   - Register/login and choose "Fixed Deposit"
   - Select amount, tenure, and nominee
   - Confirm with OTP/biometric authentication

2. **Via NetBanking:**  
   - Login to www.zxbank.asia
   - Navigate to "Deposits" → "Open Fixed Deposit"
   - Fill in required details and confirm

3. **At Branch:**  
   - Visit your nearest ZX Bank branch with KYC documents
   - Fill out the FD application form and deposit the amount

---

ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > Sample Interest Rates > | Tenure           | Regular Rate | Senior Citizen Rate |
|------------------|--------------|---------------------|
| 7 days - 45 days | 3.50%        | 4.00%               |
| 46 days–180 days | 4.25%        | 4.75%               |
| 181 days–1 year  | 5.75%        | 6.25%               |
| 1 year–3 years   | 6.20%        | 6.70%               |
| 3 years–5 years  | 6.30%        | 6.80%               |

> \*Rates are subject to change. Please refer to [ZX Bank Website](https://www.zxbank.asia) or branch for current rates in your region.

---

ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > ESG & CSR Initiatives > Part of your deposits fuel green finance projects such as Bhutanese hydropower and Nepalese solar ventures, ensuring your savings contribute to a sustainable future.

---

ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > Need Help? > Connect with "Zia," your 24x7 AI-based financial assistant on the ZX Bank Asia app, or visit any branch for customized FD solutions.

---

ZX Bank Fixed Deposits > Call to Action > **Grow your savings safely with ZX Bank Fixed Deposits!**

[Open your FD now at www.zxbank.asia](https://www.zxbank.asia)

title: ZX Bank – Bill Payments & Auto Debit Feature
chunks:
ZX Bank – Bill Payments & Auto Debit Feature > Supported Bill Payment Categories > - **Credit Cards** (ZX Bank & other banks)
- **Mobile/Postpaid Bills**
- **Prepaid Mobile Recharge**
- **DTH (Direct-to-Home TV)**
- **Broadband & Landline**
- **Electricity, Water, & Gas**
- **Insurance Premiums**
- **Educational Fees**
- **Municipality Taxes**  
- **More coming soon!**

ZX Bank – Bill Payments & Auto Debit Feature > Auto Debit Feature > How Auto Debit Works > 1. **Register Online:**  
   Enable auto debit for your chosen billers via Mobile App or NetBanking.

2. **Custom Schedule:**  
   Select the payment date (due date or preferred day prior).

3. **Automated Payments:**  
   ZX Bank automatically processes payments on your behalf.

4. **Alerts & Notifications:**  
   Get SMS/email alerts before every scheduled auto debit.

5. **Manage & Cancel Anytime:**  
   Modify or stop auto debits anytime using the "Manage Mandates" section.

ZX Bank – Bill Payments & Auto Debit Feature > Key Features > - **One-Time Setup:** Easy linking of billers and mandates
- **Secure Payments:** Protected with OTP, biometric & device authentication
- **All Major Billers Covered:** Over 400+ billers across India, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, Bhutan, Nepal
- **Real-Time Tracking:** View payment history and upcoming debits
- **AI Financial Assistant (“Zia”):** Get reminders, advice, and instant support

ZX Bank – Bill Payments & Auto Debit Feature > How To Get Started > 1. **Download the ZX Bank Asia Mobile App** (*Android/iOS*)
2. **Login** or complete e-KYC onboarding
3. **Navigate to “Bill Payments” or “Auto Debit”**  
   - Add your biller (credit card, mobile, DTH, etc.)
   - Choose “Enable Auto Debit” and set your preferences
4. **Confirm & Save** — you're done!

ZX Bank – Bill Payments & Auto Debit Feature > Need Help? > - Ask “Zia” in-app for step-by-step guidance
- Visit [www.zxbank.asia/support](https://www.zxbank.asia/support)
- Call our 24x7 helpline or visit your nearest branch

title: ZX Bank Branch Network in Bhopal
